experience.title: Strategy and Investments Analyst
experience.description: Scrutinised potential startups to invest in and to reduce the number of abandoned carts in 6thStreet (fashion e-commerce)•Reduced the number of abandoned carts by 10% by creating abandoned cart email flows•Managed 3-member customer service team to strategise primary research; suggested 10+ changes for developer and logistics team•Analysed over 20+ startups, critically examining the market size, market capitalisation, revenue model and their operational structure

experience.title: Product Management
experience.description: Built and executed the product roadmap for a digital ledger from initial concept till minimum viable product•Created the Product Requirements Document, initialised the user stories with developer and design teams of the product: PesaCash•Identified 3 new channels for targeting relevant audiences; led content team and oversaw collaboration with video editors on creative ads•Analysed 8+ industry competitors and key customer requirements in the Middle East; developed Go To Market strategy for the product
